channel.title: Comments on: The price of focus

item.title: By: Jeannette
item.dc:creator: Jeannette
item.description: Congratulations on your place in Wayra! I know what you mean about the trouble of context switching, but it sounds like you had a good schedule and handled it well! I am glad that we were able to take on some of your load with IGGD, and hope that you will now have more time to attend! All the best!
item.content:encoded: Congratulations on your place in Wayra! I know what you mean about the trouble of context switching, but it sounds like you had a good schedule and handled it well! I am glad that we were able to take on some of your load with IGGD, and hope that you will now have more time to attend! All the best!
